name: Association for Rural Development
briefDescription: We a,Registered,Non-Profit,Grass-Root Organisation doing yeoman services to derving,needy Indian RuralPoor Widows,Destitutes Rhabilitation and their Childrens Education and care for Aged,Disabled,Poor women Girl Students,Orphan and other needy deprived,unfortunate communities.So far 3000 Target peoples Benifited.Good plans are waiting.Please help us to help the poors.
